name: Step of the Flighty Fey
source: Legacy of the First World pg. 8
text: Your spell-like ability taps the magic and resilience of the First World.
benefit: A creature under the effect of your feather step spell-like ability gains DR 1/cold iron for the duration of the effect. If you have at least 8 Hit Dice, the creature instead gains DR 2/cold iron, and if you have at least 16 Hit Dice, the creature instead gains DR 3/cold iron.
text_zh: 你的类法术能力开发出了来自第一世界的魔力和适应力。
prerequisites_zh: 伽瑟兰，轻羽步APG类法术能力。
benefit_zh: 处于你轻羽步类法术能力效果的生物，在这个效果的持续时间内获得DR1/寒铁。如果你拥有至少8个生命骰，这个生物会获得DR2/寒铁，如果你拥有至少16个生命骰，这个生物会获得DR3/寒铁。
